snippet.title: Flintlock the Siege of Dawn | Extended Gameplay Overview
snippet.description:
Take a deep-dive into Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn, with commentary by Simon Dasan, (Creative Director) and Dale Pugh (Associate Art Director). Learn more about Campsites, Combat, Mobility, Reputation, Enemies, Side Quests and much more, with a plethora of never-before-seen footage from the game.

Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn is out THIS SUMMER! Wishlist on.... 

STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1832040/Flintlock_The_Siege_of_Dawn/
PS5: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10004425
XBOX: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/flintlock-the-siege-of-dawn/9pbbqhx6v3pj
EPIC: https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/p/flintlock-the-siege-of-dawn-210044

Find out more: https://playflintlock.com/

Chapters:

00:00 - Introduction and overview
01:21 - Campsites 
01:50 - Combat & Mobility
02:20 - Weapons 
04:06 - Enemies 
05:00 - Enki's Strikes and Witherings
05:43 - Armored Enemies
06:11 - Reputation
07:16 - Hamlets & Coffee Shops
08:05 - Side Quests & Exploration
09:04 - Thank you!
